qas.question: What has been a subject of speculation concerning Elizabeth's wealth?
What was Elizabeth's wealth extimated to be in 1971?
What did the palace call estimates of Elizabeth wealth in 1993?
What did the Sunday Times estimate Elizabeth's fortune to be in 2015?
Where does Elizabeth's wealth place her in the list of the richest in the UK?
In what year did Jock Colville become Elizabeth's private secretary?
How much was Elizabeth worth in 1993 according to Buckingham Palace?
Who is the wealthiest person in the UK as of 2015?
In what year did Jock Colville leave Elizabeth's service?
In what year did Jock Colville become the director of the Coutts bank?

context: Elizabeth's <a0_0>personal fortune<a0_0/> has been the subject of speculation for many years. <b7_0>Jock Colville<b7_0/>, who was her former private secretary and a director of her bank, Coutts, estimated her wealth in <b5_0><b8_0><b9_0>1971<b9_0/><b8_0/><b5_0/> at <a1_0>£2 million<a1_0/> (equivalent to about £25 million today). In 1993, Buckingham Palace called estimates of <b6_0>£100 million<b6_0/> <a2_0>"grossly overstated"<a2_0/>. She inherited an estimated £70 million estate from her mother in 2002. The Sunday Times Rich List 2015 estimated her private wealth at <a3_0>£340 million<a3_0/>, making her the <a4_0>302nd<a4_0/> richest person in the UK.
